topic.title: Removing an Existing ESX Host from a Cluster

body.p:
The process for removing an existing ESX host from cluster is as follows:
Migrate all instances on the ESX host (to be removed) to other hosts in that cluster through vCenter client. (how to migrate??)
Delete the ovsvapp-*** VM present in that host through vCenter client. (any command to run?)
Remove the ESX host from the cluster. (any command??)
